#summary Special settings to use the weblink with Internet Explorer

= Introduction =

Loading giTorrent from the hosted webserver requirers additional settings due to security restrictions in the browser.

= Details =

In short, you have to add your server as a trusted domain and enable the 'Access data sources across domains setting'.

Start Internet Explorer and Select 'Tools', 'Internet options' in the menu bar. Click the 'Security' tab and click the 'Custom Level' button. Scroll through the list until you see 'Access data sources across domains setting', select 'enable' then click 'Ok'. You are back at the 'Security' tab, click the 'Sites' button and type the page of your rTorrent serving web server and click the 'Add' button. You are done now, load giTorrent from the link [http://hhasert.oxyhost.com/giTorrent/apps/giTorrent.html giTorrent Live!] and fill in the 'Connections tab'

For additional information and screen shots of making the settings, see http://www.tibco.com/devnet/resources/gi/3_2/tips_and_techniques/accessing_data_across_subdomains32.pdf
